it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons

Interface GamesManagerRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GamesManager

    public interface GamesManagerRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    The interface on which the client calls the remote methods on the GamesManager
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Method Summary

      Method to create a game
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGamesInformation()
      Returns a list of the games currently hosted by the server and other details such as the number of players of the game, the name of the spaceship and the number of pending players (how many others need to join)

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        java.util.UUID addUser(java.lang.String username)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a new user to the server and returns its UUID to him or her
        Parameters:
        username - the nickname chosen from the user
        Returns:
        UUID which identifies the client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getGamesInformation

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGamesInformation()
                                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a list of the games currently hosted by the server and other details such as the number of players of the game, the name of the spaceship and the number of pending players (how many others need to join)
        Returns:
        list of strings, one per game hosted
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • action

        boolean action(java.util.UUID clientId,
             java.lang.String actionName,
             java.lang.String actionParameter)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Recognizes the client sending the action, finds the game it belongs to and sends the name and the parameters to the controller
        Parameters:
        clientId - the unique id of the client
        actionName - the name of the action
        actionParameter - the parameters some actions need to be performed
        Returns:
        outcome boolean
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • query

        ResponseMessage query(java.util.UUID clientId,
                    java.lang.String queryType)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Recognizes the client sending the query, finds the game it belongs to and delivers it to the controller
        Parameters:
        clientId - the unique id of the client
        queryType - the name of the query
        Returns:
        a response message (boolean + optional string)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • createGame

        boolean createGame(int numberOfPlayers,
                 java.lang.String mapName,
                 java.util.UUID clientId,
                 CommunicationType communicationType,
                 SubscriberInterface subscriber)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method to create a game
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players
        mapName - the name of the map in which the game is going to take place
        clientId - the id of the client requesting to create the game
        communicationType - the type of communication used by the client (RMI or Sockets)
        subscriber - the interface which provides the dispatch message method
        Returns:
        boolean representing the outcome
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • joinGame

        boolean joinGame(java.util.UUID clientId,
               int gameNumber,
               CommunicationType communicationType,
               SubscriberInterface subscriber)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Method to join a game
        Parameters:
        clientId - the unique id of the client requesting to join a game
        gameNumber - the number of the game to join as it appears in the list of games informations
        communicationType - the type of communication used by the client (RMI or Sockets)
        subscriber - the interface which provides the dispatch message method
        Returns:
        boolean representing the outcome
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
